channel.title: SME Business Review: Top Business Magazine & News Platform
channel.description: SME Business Review is a top-rated global business and technology magazine, catering to the SME sector. It promotes brands and executives alike

item.title: Accenture's Insurance Sector Capabilities Strengthened by ON Service Group Acquisition.
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: With the acquisition of ON Service Group, we can extend our consulting and technology offerings to managed services and provide an end-to-end service.

item.title: Analyzing Key Factors Driving the Market Expansion of Supply Chain Management Software Industry
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: “The global supply chain management software market size is estimated to grow by USD 13.96 billion from 2021 to 2026.”

item.title: Omnicom Expands its Reach in E-commerce with Flywheel Acquisition
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: “The acquisition of Flywheel significantly broadens our reach and influence in the rapidly expanding digital commerce and retail media sectors, two of the fastest-growing parts of the industry.”

item.title: Catalyst Pharmaceuticals: Transforming Lives with Rare Disease Treatments
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: Catalyst is a biopharmaceutical company committed to improving the lives of patients.

item.title: Leveraging Blockchain Technology for Environmental Accountability
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: The global market for blockchain supply chain solutions could reach $3.15 billion as adoption grows.

item.title: Hudson Technologies: Focuses on Sustainable Refrigerant Solutions
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: The company strongly supports the circular economy for refrigerants.

item.title: Eagle Bulk Shipping: Delivering Global Commodities with Efficiency and Versatility
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: The company is a US-based ship-owner-operator with a focus on dry bulk transportation.

item.title: X's Subscription Experiment ‘Not A Bot’ is Likely to Alienate Users
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: This new test was developed to bolster our already successful efforts to reduce spam, manipulation of our platform and bot activity, while balancing platform accessibility with the small fee amount. It is not a profit driver. And so far, subscription options have proven to be the main solution that works at scale.

item.title: SaaS Loans: Uncapped secures £200M, expands global services for entrepreneurs
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
item.description: Private equity firm Fortress Investment Group provides debt facility to Uncapped for expansion.

item.title: Augie Ray: An Expert Dedicated to Improving Customer Experience
item.dc:creator: SMEBR
